'''Jessica Bravura''',<ref>{{cite|url=https://www.businessinsider.com/aphmau-rise-of-jessica-bravura-roleplay-minecraft-videos-on-youtube-2024-7|title=Meet Aphmau, the Minecraft YouTuber who's become a breakout star with her viral scripted and animated series|website=Business Insider}}</ref> better known by the pseudonym '''Aphmau''', is an American [[YouTube]]r known for her roleplaying and animated content.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
In 2021, Aphmau made an appearance in [[One Trillion Minecraft Views on YouTube and Counting]], a special cinematic celebrating the ''Minecraft'' community amassing a trillion views. Although her cameo was silent, she promoted the video on social media, regarding it as an honor.<ref>{{Tweet|_Aphmau_|1471329173679624198|It has been an honor to be a part of this game for 9 years! Iâ€™m so grateful to all of you. Thank you all so much for your support, not just for me but for every amazing creator here as well <3}}</ref>

In 2024, she joined [[MC Championship]] to participate in the [[Ender Cup]], under the team the Aqua Axolotls. During the competition, she played alongside [https://www.twitch.tv/jojosolos jojosolos], [https://www.youtube.com/shubble Shubble], and [[LDShadowLady]].

In 2025, she made a {{AMCM|Easter eggs|cameo}} in {{AMCM}} along with [[LDShadowLady]], [[DanTDM]] and [[Mumbo Jumbo]], appearing as an attendee of {{AMCM|Daryl}}'s auction, while {{AMCM|Garrett}} inspects and ravages it.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|aphmau_|DH1-fZeMnKZ|Secrets out! Iâ€™m in THE Minecraft Movie! ðŸ¥¹ Iâ€™m so honored to be making a background cameo appearance with some lovely Minecraft legends! Let me know if yâ€™all see us! ðŸ’œ|March 30, 2025}}</ref> Prior to being officially announced for the film, she alluded to traveling to {{w|New Zealand}} during filming.<ref>{{Cite Instagram|aphmau_|C49iAECMcso|Got to visit Hobbiton! ðŸ’œ Such a fun trip to New Zealand with @dantdm @ldshadowlady @officialmumbo and @valkyrae!
